title: New: The Big Pink – Stay Gold (Araabmuzik Remix ft. Danny Brown)
body:
With** The Big Pink**’s sophomore LP due out sometime in January 2012, the hype train is steadily moving thanks partly to an **AraabMuzik** remix of their single, **_‘Stay Gold_**’.

After the single and remix dropped it all got even better, with a re-cut of the remix surfacing featuring the voice of **[Danny Brown](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/10115-new-danny-brown-xxx/ "New: Danny Brown – XXX")**. The neon tinted slacker rock tune has been taken into a new direction entirely, with the drawn out and psychedelic vocals becoming a perfect backdrop for Browns tortured story, **_“so I stay high, like I’m walking on mountains”_**.

Stream the original, remix and re-work below.
